Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 2nd overall pick, by Minnesota in 2006...
Traded from Minnesota to San Francisco on 6/1/2006 (Going to SF: P T. Lincecum. Going to MIN: P H. Street)...
Injured on 6/28/2006 with a Tight Shoulder, out for 5 days...
Injured on 8/13/2006 with a Pulled Tricep Muscle, out for 8-9 weeks...
Had first career hit (double) on 4/4/2007, off Ismael Valdez (FLA)...
Earned first career win on 4/4/2007...
Injured on 5/26/2007 with a Torn Bicep Muscle, out for 4-5 weeks...
Hit first career homerun on 6/28/2007, off Jonathon Sanchez (COL)...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 6/1/2010, going 2-0, 0.80...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/30/2010, winning 2 games with a 1.13 ERA...
Won Player of the Week award on 7/14/2010, winning 2 games with a 0.54 ERA...
Was selected to the 2010 Allstar game...
Struck out 17 batters against Washington on 9/5/2010...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 10/1/2010, going 5-1, 1.74...
Won Cy Young Award in 2010, going 25-2, 1.77 ERA...
Was selected to the 2011 Allstar game...
Was selected to the 2012 Allstar game...
Injured on 9/20/2012 with a Stiff Elbow, out for one week...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 10/1/2012, going 4-0, 0.59...
Won World Championship with San Francisco in 2012...
Was selected to the 2013 Allstar game...
Was selected to the 2014 Allstar game...
Injured on 7/22/2014 with a Sore Shoulder, out for 1-2 weeks...
Struck out 15 batters against Atlanta on 9/7/2014...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/8/2014, winning 2 games with a 0.00 ERA...
Won Cy Young Award in 2014, going 22-5, 1.67 ERA...
Injured on 4/6/2015 with a Spasms Back, out for 7 weeks...
Pitched NO-HITTER against Atlanta on 6/12/2015, striking out 12...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 7/1/2015, going 5-1, 0.96...
Was selected to the 2015 Allstar game...
Injured on 7/29/2015 with a Ruptured Bicep Tendon, out for 8 weeks...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/21/2016, winning 2 games with a 0.00 ERA...
Was selected to the 2016 Allstar game...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 9/1/2016, going 4-0, 0.99...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 10/1/2016, going 5-0, 1.64...
Won Cy Young Award in 2016, going 25-7, 1.74 ERA...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 6/1/2017, going 6-1, 1.19...
Was selected to the 2017 Allstar game...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 9/1/2017, going 5-0, 1.19...
Won Cy Young Award in 2017, going 24-4, 1.71 ERA...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 5/1/2018, going 3-2, 0.68...
Was selected to the 2018 Allstar game...
Was selected to the 2019 Allstar game...
Was selected to the 2020 Allstar game...
Injured on 8/30/2020 with a Torn Bicep Muscle, out for 7 weeks...
Was selected to the 2021 Allstar game...
Injured on 9/26/2021 with a Strained Bicep Tendon, out for 3 weeks...
